company_name: Zamil Air Conditioners And Refrigeration Services Co
policy_holder: Zamil Air Conditioners And Refrigeration Services

coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: No pre-approval required for VIP members for outpatient & in-patient services except for services with specified limits. Pre-authorization required for dental (other than scaling), optical, maternity, kidney dialysis, and hearing aids.
coverage_details.special_instructions: Transportation of mortal remains to home country in case of death in KSA is covered up to SR 20,000 per insurance cover period. Organ Transplant & Bone Marrow Transplant is covered. Kidney dialyses covered up to policy limit. Vitamins covered if deficiency confirmed by lab. Parent accommodation covered during child’s admission (up to age 18). MOH providers included for emergency and in-patient referrals. Scaling covered once a year. Allergy tests/treatment covered if medically required. Both life-threatening and non-life-threatening cases covered. OTC medicines covered. Medication limit is equal to pre-authorization approval limit.

coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: Standard pre-authorization as per Bupa policy. Pre-authorization limit: SR 2,000.00.
